title: Loved it!
text:
I recently stayed at the Millenium Hilton for 5 nights on a business trip to NYC. The hotel is in a fantastic position in lower Manhattan and near a number of tube stations.
From my room on the 26th level I had a view down into one of the reflections pools of the 9/11 memorial.
Check-in was efficient and staff were friendly. There were 3 of us checking in and for some reason one of my colleagues booking didn't include breakfast. The lady who checked me in gave me some extra vouchers for my colleague. Fantastic generosity.
I had a 1 bedroom suite on the 26th level. The room had a sitting room with a 2 seater couch a separate lounge chair, desk and TV. The bedroom was also large and the bed was a king size.
Breakfast was served in their restaurant 'Church & Dey' and they have a good selection of breakfast foods.
I didn't have a problem during my stay and can say that I would definitely stay here again.
The hotel was damaged during the 9/11 attack. The hotel is an easy 3-5 minute walk to the 9/11 museum.
